SELECT hnp.notice_id AS id, hnp.title AS title, hnp.notice_body AS content, hnp.published_date AS sendDate, hnp.end_date AS endDate, hnp.published_status_code AS status, hn.sticky_flag AS sticky, hn.object_version_number AS object_version_number FROM hmsg_notice_published hnp join hmsg_notice hn on hn.notice_id=hnp.notice_id
hn.status_code!='DELETED'
AND hnp.title LIKE concat(concat('%', #{title}), '%')
AND hnp.published_status_code = #{status}
AND ( hn.title LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}), '%') OR hnp.notice_body LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}), '%') )
